alert.note: Alert for Leon; Limestone; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:32PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Robertson, west central Leon and central Limestone Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 832 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms extending from Groesbeck to 7 miles northwest of Marquez, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mexia, Groesbeck, Lake Limestone, Twin Oak Reservoir, Fort Parker State Park, Lake Mexia, Thornton, Marquez, Ben Hur, Box Church, Seale, Bald Prairie, Oletha, Shiloh and Farrar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
